story.text: ... is a developer for [[Thought Works]]. He was born in the UK, grew up in Australia, is employed by the UK office, and is currently working in India.
When he is in London you can often find him hanging out at [[Geek Night]] [http://geeknight.thoughtworks.com/index.php/GeekNight geeknight.thoughtworks.com] or the [[Extreme Tuesday Club]].
He maintains a blog at [http://www.skizz.biz www.skizz.biz]
